name: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island
name_original: Labyrinths of the World: Secrets of Easter Island
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

After saving the world once again, MI6 has rewarded you with a much-needed vacation, so you’re off for a relaxing retreat to the mysterious Easter Island. As soon as you arrive though, an eruption opens up a giant crater, trapping a team of archaeologists deep underground. It seems they’ve found some incredibly dangerous object that should have stayed hidden down below, and now you’re their only chance of getting out alive!

• SAVE THE WORLD FROM FIERY DESTRUCTION!
That cave-in unleashed a terrible force that’s been safely imprisoned for ages. Now that it’s free, the fate of the whole world rests on your ability to stop it!

• CAN YOU DEFEAT THE GIANT FIRE GODS?
Fight off these colossal enemies through a series of magical hidden object scenes.

• TAKE A TRIP INTO THE UNKNOWN
Travel to strange worlds to solve cryptic puzzles and mind-bending mini-games.

• STOP ANOTHER VENGEFUL GOD IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Take on a different adventure and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Crystal Flowers, morphing objects, and more!
